item.title: 哈塞特称特朗普不任命其为美联储主席或许正确
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文·哈塞特表示，唐纳德·特朗普总统很可能会让他继续担任现职，这将使他无法角逐下一任美联储主席职位。【原文：White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said President Donald Trump may well keep him in his current job, which would eliminate him from contention for the next Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: 巴西亿万富翁巴蒂斯塔家族蓄势待发，助力委内瑞拉石油产业复兴
item.description: 亿万富翁巴蒂斯塔兄弟正瞄准一个储量达10亿桶的委内瑞拉石油项目，该项目有望受益于美国总统唐纳德·特朗普计划重振这个南美国家的能源产业。【原文：The billionaire Batista brothers are eyeing a billion-barrel Venezuelan oil project that stands to benefit from US President Donald Trump’s planned revival of the South American nation’s energy sector.】

item.title: 德意志银行称，特朗普引发的欧元区痛苦因美国资产敞口受限
item.description: 德意志银行策略师指出，由于美国高度依赖欧洲资本，特朗普总统就格陵兰问题对欧洲各国政府重启贸易威胁对欧元造成的冲击可能有限。【原文：The fallout on the euro from President Donald Trump’s renewed trade threats toward European governments over Greenland may be limited because of how much the US relies on the region for capital, according to a Deutsche Bank AG strategist.】

item.title: 金融科技巨头初创平台与米兰科技中心合并
item.description: 由意大利亿万富翁安德烈亚·皮尼亚塔罗支持的非营利基金会正与米兰顶尖大学的技术孵化器合并，旨在推动该国对初创企业的早期投资。【原文：A nonprofit foundation backed by Italian billionaire Andrea Pignataro is merging with the tech incubators of Milan’s leading universities in a bid to boost early-stage investment in the country.】

item.title: 贝森特称参议院对四位美联储候选人皆表示满意
item.description: 财政部长斯科特·贝森特向美国全国广播公司新闻频道表示，参议院对特朗普政府正在考虑的四位"优秀"候选人中的任何一位接替美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔都将"相当满意"。【原文：The Senate will be “quite happy” with any one of the four “great” candidates the Trump administration is considering to replace Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told NBC News.】

item.title: 华尔街2026年20大热门交易：从人工智能分散投资到科技股尾部机会
item.description: 当投资者在害怕错过股市进一步上涨与不断加剧的地缘政治风险之间举棋不定时，他们可以参考华尔街大型银行衍生品策略师的建议。【原文：As investors are caught between fear of missing out on a further stock market rally and the building geopolitical risks, they can take a cue from the derivatives strategists at the biggest Wall Street banks.】

item.title: “没有理由持有”：软件股因担忧新型人工智能工具而下跌
item.description: 新年本应为疲软的软件股带来机遇，然而该板块却迎来了多年来最糟糕的开局。【原文：The new year was supposed to bring opportunities for beaten-down software stocks. Instead, the group is off to its worst start in years.】

item.title: 主权财富基金加入新兴市场私募信贷争夺战
item.description: 新兴市场私募信贷交易正迎来创纪录的增长浪潮，今年这一趋势有望延续。众多机构投资者和主权财富基金正寻求分散其以美国为中心的投资组合。【原文：A record wave of private credit deals across emerging markets looks set to extend this year, with a host of institutional and sovereign wealth investors seeking to diversify their US-focused portfolios.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称红杉资本将参与人工智能初创公司Anthropic的融资轮
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，红杉资本正计划对人工智能初创公司Anthropic进行"大额投资"，该公司开发了聊天机器人Claude。【原文：Sequoia Capital is planning a “big investment” in Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup behind the chatbot Claude, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长卡扎克告诉《金融时报》欧洲已与俄罗斯"处于战争状态"
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马丁斯·卡扎克斯向《金融时报》表示，政策制定者不应天真地认为欧洲尚未与俄罗斯"开战"，各国央行需要为局势进一步升级做好准备。【原文：Policymakers shouldn’t be “naive” to think that Europe isn’t already “at war” with Russia and central banks need to prepare for further escalation, European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks told the Financial Times.】

item.title: 南非克鲁格国家公园将在天气好转后恢复日间游览
item.description: 南非标志性克鲁格国家公园的日间游览将于周一恢复，此前该地区因上周致命洪水遭受重创，目前天气状况已有所好转。【原文：Day visitation to South Africa’s iconic Kruger National Park will resume on Monday on better weather conditions following the devastation caused by deadly floods last week.】

item.title: 太阳能巨头隆基光电再度全年亏损，行业低迷持续
item.description: 中国太阳能巨头隆基绿能科技股份有限公司警告称，由于持续低迷的行业形势继续拖累太阳能供应链，该公司2025年可能再次出现亏损。【原文：Chinese solar giant Longi Green Energy Technology Co. warned it may report another loss in calendar year 2025 as a prolonged downturn continues to weigh on the solar supply chain.】

item.title: 香港将与上海黄金交易所签署谅解备忘录，陈家强表示
item.description: 香港财政司司长陈茂波表示，香港将在即将举行的亚洲金融论坛上与上海黄金交易所签署谅解备忘录。【原文：Hong Kong will sign a memorandum of understanding with the Shanghai Gold Exchange at the upcoming Asian Financial Forum, according to the city’s Financial Secretary Paul Chan.】

item.title: 日本争端引发关注，中国稀土产品出口下滑
item.description: 中国稀土产品出口量在12月环比下降，投资者正密切关注中日韩之间日益紧张的局势，这种紧张局势可能引发更严格的出口管制。【原文：China’s rare-earth product exports declined in December compared with the previous month, as investors monitor heightened tensions between Beijing and Japan that could trigger tighter shipment controls.】

item.title: 中国科技股新热潮摆脱经济低迷阴霾
item.description: 在DeepSeek的人工智能突破震撼全球市场近一年后，中国正以新一轮技术进步的浪潮迈入2026年，这些技术正推动股市上涨，尽管其经济依然脆弱。【原文：Nearly a year after DeepSeek’s AI breakthrough rattled global markets, China is entering 2026 with a fresh wave of technological advances that are powering a stock rally, even as its economy remains fragile.】

item.title: 特朗普对格陵兰施压引发关税风波重燃欧洲旧伤
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统对格陵兰岛的执念，给欧洲及世界各地的领导人敲响了冰冷警钟：任何协议都可能生变。【原文：President Donald Trump’s fixation on Greenland offers an ice-cold reminder to leaders in Europe and abroad: No deal is ever final.】

item.title: 贝莱德的里克·里德竞选美联储主席的呼声日益高涨
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着特朗普总统权衡国会对其任命更亲美人士担任美联储主席的反对声浪，贝莱德集团的里克·里德尔近期在美联储主席人选竞逐中势头渐起。【原文：The candidacy of BlackRock’s Rick Rieder to be the next Federal Reserve chair has gained late momentum, people familiar with the matter say, as President Donald Trump weighs congressional blowback in his bid to put a friendlier face at the head of the central bank.】

item.title: 日本央行持续引发市场对加息的猜测，令日元观察人士保持警惕
item.description: 即将召开的日本央行会议可能引发日元剧烈波动，投资者正试图判断下次加息时机——而迫在眉睫的选举更增添了不确定性。【原文：The upcoming Bank of Japan meeting offers scope for sharp movements in the yen as investors try to gauge the timing of its next hike — with a looming election adding to the confusion.】

item.title: 欧盟拟叫停美欧贸易协议 因特朗普最新关税威胁
item.description: 欧盟立法者准备阻止批准欧盟与美国的贸易协议，原因是特朗普总统誓言要对那些在美国威胁面前支持格陵兰岛的国家加征关税。【原文：European Union lawmakers are poised to block approval of the EU’s trade deal with the US over President Donald Trump’s vow to impose tariffs on countries that supported Greenland in the face of American threats.】

item.title: Sweetgreen首席发展官塔兰特将离职
item.description: Sweetgreen公司首席发展官克里斯·塔兰特在领导公司拓展业务版图逾一年后，即将离开这家餐饮连锁企业。【原文：Sweetgreen Inc. Chief Development Officer Chris Tarrant is leaving the restaurant chain after a more than a year leading the company’s efforts to expand its footprint.】

item.title: MBS收益成为购买公司债券的又一理由：《信贷周刊》
item.description: 未来数月，企业债券需求可能获得意外助力：投资者在获利了结美国抵押贷款债券持仓后，需要另寻投资标的。【原文：Demand for corporate bonds could get a boost from a surprising source in the coming months: investors taking profits on US mortgage bond holdings who need another asset to buy instead.】

item.title: 特朗普猛批戴蒙，威胁就摩根大通终止服务一事起诉
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普猛烈抨击摩根大通公司及其首席执行官杰米·戴蒙，威胁要起诉这家银行巨头。特朗普声称自己在2021年1月6日国会骚乱事件后遭银行断绝服务。【原文：President Donald Trump railed against JPMorgan Chase & Co. and its leader Jamie Dimon, threatening to sue the banking giant over his claim that he was debanked after the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot.】

item.title: 欧盟与南美洲签署贸易协定，历经25年谈判
item.description: 欧盟与南共市于周六正式签署了全球规模最大的自由贸易协定之一，这项筹备逾二十年的协议终于尘埃落定。【原文：The European Union and Mercosur officially signed one of the world’s largest free trade agreements on Saturday, clinching a deal that has been in the works for more than two decades.】

item.title: 印度监管机构因去年12月航班大面积取消事件对印地戈航空处以240万美元罚款
item.description: 印度民航总局周六晚间宣布，已对印度捷特航空处以逾2.2亿卢比（约合240万美元）的罚款，并就该航空公司去年12月的航班取消问题对其高管提出严厉批评。【原文：India’s Directorate General of Civil Aviation said late Saturday that it imposed a penalty of over 220 million rupees ($2.4 million) on IndiGo and chided the airline’s executives over their December flight cancellations.】

item.title: 2020 Fed Transcripts Show How Powell Sold Fateful Rate Guidance
item.description: 美联储2020年政策会议记录周五公布，披露了新细节：主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔当时力推一项政策调整，而这项调整后来令他深感后悔。【原文：Transcripts of the Federal Reserve’s 2020 policy meetings, made public Friday, revealed new details about how Chair Jerome Powell pushed for a change he would later regret.】

item.title: 泽连斯基称俄方袭击破坏对话前景
item.description: 乌克兰总统泽连斯基表示，克里姆林宫部队持续的空袭正破坏基辅与莫斯科之间"连微小的对话机会"都难以维系。【原文：Constant airstrikes by Kremlin forces are undermining “even the small opportunities for dialogue” between Kyiv and Moscow, said President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.】

item.title: 高企的股市冲入高风险财报季
item.description: 迄今为止，全球股票投资者前景一片光明，有望实现连续第四年的稳健回报，因为从东京到巴黎再到纽约，股市正同步上涨。【原文：So far, so good for global equity investors looking to clock a fourth straight year of solid returns as stocks rise in tandem from Tokyo to Paris to New York.】

item.title: 马查多采取新策略争取特朗普对委内瑞拉问题的支持
item.description: 玛丽亚·科里娜·马查多在特朗普白宫展开的魅力攻势——包括展示镶嵌在精美相框中的闪亮诺贝尔奖章——是这位委内瑞拉反对派领袖重新调整策略的一部分，旨在夺回对该国变革叙事的掌控权。【原文：María Corina Machado’s charm offensive in the Trump White House, complete with a shiny Nobel medal in an elegant frame, is part of a recalibrated effort by the leader of Venezuela’s opposition to reclaim the narrative about the country’s transformation.】

item.title: 美联储与以色列形成统一战线
item.description: 大陪审团传票可能对美联储产生反效果【原文：Grand jury subpoenas could backfire on the Fed】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉AI5芯片设计已近尾声，正着手开发AI6芯片
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆·马斯克在X平台发文称，该公司为全自动驾驶系统设计的AI5芯片已接近完成，并已进入下一代AI6芯片的早期开发阶段。【原文：Tesla Inc. is almost finished with the design of the AI5 chip for its full self-driving system, and is in the early stages of developing the next version, AI6, Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said in a post on X.】
